attributes.title: bugzilla

attributes.description: Number of Bugs submitted per product in the selected time frame.
attributes.title: Char1: Pie chart bugs per product

attributes.description: Summary of the total Bugs submitted by Product in the selected time frame.
attributes.title: Char1: Table summary bugs per product

attributes.description: Bug submitters, in descending order by number of submissions in the selected period. The "Collaborators" column displays the number of users assigned to the tickets created by each submitter. The results are limited to 500 users (ordered by number of bugs submitted) for performance reasons.
attributes.title: Char1: Table Bug submitters

attributes.description: Weekly evolution of the Bugs submitted in the selected period, labeled according to their current status.
attributes.title: Char1: Bugs by status over time

attributes.description: Bugs submitted by product, divided by Severity. The number of bugs is represented as a percentage relative to the total number of bugs for that Product in the selected period.
attributes.title: Char1: Bugs per project and severity

attributes.description: This dashboard offers an overview of the Bugs submitted for all the Products in the selected period, detailing the amount of activity coming from each Product.
